spacewars.game

Class SpaceShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • spacewars.game.SpaceShip
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aggressive, Basher, Drunkard, Human, Runner, Special

    public abstract class SpaceShip
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstract class representing a spaceship in the game. All spaceships in the game inherit these methods and data fields.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Attributes for the closest ship in the game.

      Spaceship's data members.
      protected static int RIGHT

      The state of the spaceship's shield: on/off.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpaceShip

        public SpaceShip()
        The default constructor of the class. This constructor creates a new spaceship according to setSpaceShip() method.

    • Method Detail

      • doAction

        public abstract void doAction(SpaceWars game)
        Does the actions of this ship for this round. This is called once per round by the SpaceWars game driver.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to which this ship belongs.

      • collidedWithAnotherShip

        public void collidedWithAnotherShip()
        This method is called every time a collision with this ship occurs.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method is called whenever a ship has died. It resets the ship's attributes, and starts it at a new random position.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Checks if this ship is dead.
        Returns:
        true if the ship is dead. false otherwise.

      • getPhysics

        public SpaceShipPhysics getPhysics()
        Gets the physics object that controls this ship.
        Returns:
        the physics object that controls the ship.

      • gotShot

        public void gotShot()
        This method is called by the SpaceWars game object when ever this ship gets shot at (with or without a shield).

      • getImage

        public java.awt.Image getImage()
        Gets the image of this ship. This method should return the image of the ship with or without the shield. This will be displayed on the GUI at the end of the round.
        Returns:
        the image of this ship.

      • fire

        public void fire(SpaceWars game)
        Attempts to fire a shot.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object.

      • shieldOn

        public void shieldOn()
        Attempts to turn on the shield.

      • teleport

        public void teleport()
        Attempts to teleport.

      • recharge

        protected void recharge()
        This method is called once by doAction() and is recharging the spaceship each round. It will regenerate energy and will update its stats.

      • setClosestShipAttributes

        protected void setClosestShipAttributes(SpaceShip other)
        This method updates this ship's attributes regarding the closest ship's distance and angle in relation to this ship.
        Parameters:
        other - SpaceShip obj. of the closest ship.
